remarks: A nonzero vector in an atom determines the atom.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
lsatel.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatel.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsatel.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatel.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatel.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
lsatel.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
lsatel.e $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
lsatel $p |- ( ph -> U = ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
